audit.search: Search for specific data from here.
audit.fromDate: Click here to choose the start date.
audit.toDate: Click here to choose the end date.
audit.floatingFilterInput: Here you can search for specific column-wise data.
audit.floatingFilterButton: Here you can filter the data based on different conditions.
audit.filter: After entering specific data, click here to filter it out.
audit.download: Click here to download the entire dataset in Excel format. Alternatively, select specific checkboxes to download only the chosen data in Excel format.
audit.refresh: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
